name: But that wasn't the truth...
description:
This game is for the Spooktober Jam game jam. This is the first game jam that I have participated in, I had a lot of fun making this game.

credit to:

https://opengameart.org/ -  for the sound effects.

William - for the music.

Mal - for the background and start and end screens.

Jack - for the level design.

and Taj - for the game art and sprites.
